data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Central with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Central, Ghana
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Central. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Central, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Central, Ghana.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Arab people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arab people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arab people is yours.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Central, Ghana a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Central, Ghana, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.section_summary:
the state of Central, Ghana has a population of 1,717,500.

We estimate Central has 444,678 people who might know Jesus, 627,016 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 645,806 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Central to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
